tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlasticPollutionData ( 
    RecordID INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    LocationID INT, 
    PollutionLevel DECIMAL, 
    DateRecorded DATE, 
    AnalysisType VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE policy_making (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  country VARCHAR(255),
  legislation TEXT,
  impact VARCHAR(255),
  enacted_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE plastic_pollution_data (
  country VARCHAR,
  year INT,
  pollution_rate FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (country, year)
)

CREATE TABLE marine_life_impact (
  species VARCHAR,
  impact_type VARCHAR,
  impact_severity VARCHAR,
  PRIMARY KEY (species)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_measures (
  policy_id INT,
  policy_description TEXT,
  policy_effectiveness VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (policy_id)
)

CREATE TABLE pollution_sources (
  source_id INT,
  source_type VARCHAR(50),
  source_description TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (source_id)
)

CREATE TABLE conservation_actions (
  action_id INT,
  action_description TEXT,
  action_effectiveness VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (action_id)
)
